mapper.select: SELECT checkout_id, user_id, book_isbn, DATE_FORMAT(checkout_begin_date,"%Y-%m-%d %T") AS "checkout_begin_date", DATE_FORMAT(checkout_end_date,"%Y-%m-%d %T") AS "checkout_end_date", DATE_FORMAT(checkout_return_date,"%Y-%m-%d %T") AS "checkout_return_date", checkout_renew_count FROM checkouts WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND checkout_return_date IS NULL
SELECT reservation_id, user_id, book_isbn, DATE_FORMAT(reservation_date,"%Y-%m-%d %T") AS "reservation_date" FROM reservations WHERE book_isbn = #{book_isbn} ORDER BY reservation_date ASC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, question_id, question_answer, user_salt, user_point, user_type_id, checkout_date) VALUES( #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{question_id}, #{question_answer}, #{user_salt}, 10, 1, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %T') )

INSERT INTO checkouts(checkout_id, user_id, book_isbn, checkout_begin_date, checkout_end_date, checkout_renew_count) VALUES(#{checkout_id},#{user_id},#{book_isbn},DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %T'), DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d %T'),2)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reservations WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND book_isbn = #{book_isbn}
